result.execSummary:
The defendant Dalton J Siam was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dalton J Siam

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Order that Atty Gregg Waterman is permitted  to Withdraw as Counsel signed by TWB
from Atty Gregg Waterman   re: Petition & Order permitting Atty to Withdraw being filed

State by John Kellis; Def. in person with Atty. Gregg Waterman; 
8:34 State will file amended complaint by the end of the day 
Poss. of Drug Para. - plea of guilty, guilty plea quest. on file, no promises, no threats, plea F.V.I. made, suff. factual basis, found guilty
  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed
SENT:  2 days jail and 2 days credit and court costs are waived

11:27 am - No appearance by Def - Atty Gregg Earl Waterman present.  NA by State.
Waterman comments - Siam is in mental health recovery services and was in lock down over the weekend. 
CT:  Warrant - $250 cash

3:02 pm - No appearance by Def - Atty Gregg Earl Waterman present.  Justine L. Suleski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Waterman spoke to someone at def's residence.  Def was sleeping and didn't want to be woke up. 
CT:  Warrant - $250 cash
Waterman requests case be set for plea - 3/23/15 @ 11:15 (TWB)

State by John Kellis; Def. in person with Gregg Waterman; 
2:30 COURT:  PLEA HEARING 3-20 AT 2:45

State by Vasupuram / Def in custody w/ Atty Eric Sanford
Copy of Complaint to Atty
Reading Waived / rights given / penalty advised
Pre-trial report filed
Def stands mute - NG plea entered
$500 Sig bond signed by def w/ conditions:  No drugs or cont subs w/o valid prescription; No drug paraphernalia;  Comply w/ JS conditions w/ testing
PTC DA:  2-13-15 @ 2:30
STC:  3-5-15 @ 10am w/ TWB
